Library() - Constructor for class pl.edu.agh.kis.Library
 
libraryAndQueue - Static variable in class pl.edu.agh.kis.Library
Semaphore for library and queue (a.k.a. whole library + queue outside it) It is used to make sure that only 5 readers or 1 writer can be in library at the same time.
libraryLock - Static variable in class pl.edu.agh.kis.Library
Semaphore for library (a.k.a. only library) It is used to make sure that only 5 readers can be in library at the same time.
logger - Static variable in class pl.edu.agh.kis.Library
Logger for logging information about library
logger - Variable in class pl.edu.agh.kis.Logging
Logger for logging information about library It is object of Logger class from log4j2
logger - Static variable in class pl.edu.agh.kis.Reader
Logger for logging information about reading
logger - Static variable in class pl.edu.agh.kis.Writer
Logger for logging information about writing
Logging - Class in pl.edu.agh.kis
Class for logging used in Reader, Writer and Library classes Implementation of logging is based on log4j2

readLock - Static variable in class pl.edu.agh.kis.Library

W

writeLock - Static variable in class pl.edu.agh.kis.Library
Semaphore for writer lock It is used to make sure that only 1 writer can be in library at the same time.

Class representing writer Writer can request to write in library and finish writing.
